title: Rain-X 630035 X-Treme Clean Shower Door Cleaner, 12 Fl. Oz, Formulated To Glass Doors - Easy Use, Removes Soap Scum, Dirt, Hard Water Build-up, Calcium, Lime And Rust Stains
description: Rain‑X X-Treme Clean Shower Door Cleaner removes harsh build-up on glass shower doors to deliver the ultimate clean and an extreme sparkling shine. This unique product is specially formulated for use on glass shower doors and glass surfaces only, it is ideal for removing soap scum, dirt, grime and hard water build-up, calcium, lime stains and rust stains. It takes seconds and is easy to apply and leaves a durable coating that protects and lasts for weeks making it a stable for your shower cleaning supplies! It's also an ideal prep for using in combination with Rain-X Shower Door Water Repellent: it leaves behind a clean and pristine glass surface to apply the water repellent so the water can bead and slide right off. Directions: For best use - use in a well ventilated area, apply the product to a damp, soft cloth or directly onto your glass shower door. Then while applying pressure and using a circular motion, rub onto the glass surface. Finally rinse and wipe dry with a clean paper towel or cotton cloth.
